00020 #ifndef RDK2_QUATERNION_H
00021 #define RDK2_QUATERNION_H
00022 
00023 #include <cmath>
00024 
00025 #include "point2o.h"
00026 #include "point3.h"
00027 
00028 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00029 
00030 template <typename Numeric>
00031 class Quaternion {
00032 protected:
00033     Point3<Numeric> v;
00034     
00035 public:
00036     double &x, &y, &z, w;
00037     
00039 
00040     Quaternion():v(0,0,0),x(v.x),y(v.y),z(v.z),w(1){ }
00041     Quaternion(Numeric _x, Numeric _y, Numeric _z, Numeric _w): v(_x,_y,_z),x(v.x),y(v.y),z(v.z),w(_w) { }
00042     Quaternion(const Point3<Numeric>& p, Numeric _w=0): v(p.x, p.y,p.z),x(v.x),y(v.y),z(v.z),w(_w) { }
00043     Quaternion(const Quaternion<Numeric> &q): v(q.x,q.y,q.z),x(v.x),y(v.y),z(v.z),w(q.w) { }
00045     
00047 
00048     inline Point3<Numeric>& getVector() const {return v;}
00050     
00052 
00053 
00054     inline Quaternion<Numeric> conjugate() const {
00055         return Quaternion<Numeric>(v *-1, w);
00056     }
00057     
00059     inline Numeric mod2() const {
00060         return this->x * this->x + this->y *this-> y + this->z * this->z + this->w * this->w;
00061     }
00062     
00064     inline Numeric norm() const {
00065         return sqrt(mod2());
00066     }
00067     
00069     inline Quaternion<Numeric> inverse() const {
00070         return conjugate() * 1.0/mod2();
00071     }
00073     
00075 
00076 
00077     inline Quaternion<Numeric> operator+(const Quaternion<Numeric>& q) const {
00078         return Quaternion<Numeric>(x + q.x, y + q.y, z + q.z, w + q.w);
00079     }
00080     
00082     inline Quaternion<Numeric> operator-(const Quaternion<Numeric>& q) const {
00083         return Quaternion<Numeric>(x - q.x, y - q.y, z - q.z, w - q.w);
00084     }
00085     
00087     inline Quaternion<Numeric> operator*(const Numeric& s) const{
00088         return Quaternion<Numeric>(s * x, s * y, s * z, s * w);
00089     }
00090     
00092     Quaternion<Numeric> operator*(const Quaternion<Numeric>& q) const {
00093         Point3<Numeric> vector = v.cross(q.getVector()) + q.getVector() * w + v * q.w;
00094         Numeric scalar = w * q.w - v * q.getVector();
00095         return Quaternion<Numeric>(vector, scalar);
00096     }
00097     
00099     inline Quaternion<Numeric> euclidean(const Quaternion<Numeric>& q) const {
00100         Point3<Numeric> vector = v.cross(q.getVector()) * -1 + q.getVector() * w - v * q.w;
00101         Numeric scalar = w * q.w + v * q.getVector();
00102         return Quaternion<Numeric>(vector, scalar);
00103     }
00104     
00107     Quaternion<Numeric> rotate(const Point3<Numeric>& axis, const double alpha) const {
00108         Quaternion<Numeric> z;
00109         z.w = std::cos(alpha * 0.5);
00110         z.v = axis * (1./axis.mod()) * std::sin(alpha * 0.5);
00111         return z * *this * z.conjugate();
00112     }
00114     
00116 
00117     
00119     inline bool operator==(const Quaternion<Numeric>& q) const {
00120         return v == q.getVector() && w == w;
00121     }
00122     
00124     inline bool operator!=(const Quaternion<Numeric>& q) const {
00125         return !(q == *this);
00126     }
00128 
00129 };
00130 
00131 typedef Quaternion< double > Quaterniond;
00132 
00133 }}
00134 
00135 #endif
